content.question: The repetition of versions of the word “like” at the end of each line of the poem primarily serves to

choices.label: highlight the speaker’s desire to emulate others’ speech
emphasize how the word is frequently misunderstood
create humor through repetition that builds in effect

content.answer: create humor through repetition that builds in effect

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
